moves.9... Qe7+: Black is being aggressive. It's normally good policy to tuck your King in a safe spot before launching an attack...
moves.11. bxc3: Forced if I want to not give away my piece.
moves.12... Re8: A very subtle error. The Rook should have continued to guard Black's KB2, for reasons which will become clear.
moves.13. Bxd6: If the Queen does not recapture, I win a piece. If it does...
moves.14. Qxf7+: it allows a forced mate. [That sneaky Bishop on QN3! Black can't captutre the Q...]
